personal.name: Bogdan Circiu
personal.bio: Computer Science graduate and AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate. Working knowledge of Java, Spring Boot, AWS, Python, SQL, and React. Seeking entry-level positions in software development, with a particular interest in DevOps, cloud engineering, and AWS. Currently learning Docker and Kubernetes.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Designed and built a full stack E-commerce that manages users, products, and orders. Integrated Stripe for payment processing and developed security system (JWT) to ensure safe user authentication.

projects.title: Portfolio Web Page
projects.description: personal resume website built with React + Vite and deployed using a fully serverless AWS architecture.

projects.title: Client Appointment Tracker
projects.description: A Java application designed with a flexible architecture supporting multiple data storage backends (text files, binary files, SQL database), runtime configurability, and comprehensive CRUD operations for Patient and Appointment entities with real-world constraints like non-overlapping appointments. Includes dual user interfaces: a JavaFX GUI and a CLI.

projects.title: Library Management System
projects.description: A Python-based Library Management System with a layered architecture for efficient handling of book and client records. Features include unit tests for reliability and user-friendly book rental and return functionality.
